channel.title: Making duel in certain area

item.title: Making duel in certain area
item.dc:creator: @sickamore sickamore
item.description:
@sickamore wrote:

i need help making it so that when you start a duel it teles both of you, right now it only teles me…this is what i have:

[code] if (dw.duelConfirmed2) {
teleportToX = 3345 + misc.random(10);
teleportToY = 3251 + misc.random(10);
startDuel();
dw.startDuel();
} else {

sendQuest(“Waiting for other player…”, 6571);
dw.sendQuest(“Other player has accepted”, 6571);
}
break;[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 15, 2008, 07:23:11 pm[/size][hr]i still need help…Someone fix it for me please.
